Package tud.iir.extraction.fact

Class Summary
EntityFactExtractionThread The EntityFactExtractionThread extracts facts for one given entity.
FactExtractionDecisionTree The fact extraction decision tree creates a DOM of a given mark up and searches for a given attribute depending on where the attribute is, a decision about the corresponding value will be made.
FactExtractionProcess The fact extraction process.
FactExtractor W The FactExtractor class.
FactQuery A fact query is a search query to retrieve relevant pages for an entity to extract facts from.
FactQueryFactory The FactQueryFactory creates FactQuery objects.
FactString The fact string is the string where the fact value is expected to be found in this string can have been derived from different methods depending on where the attribute has been found e.g. if in free text "The i8510 INNOV8 offers 16GB of built-in memory in addition to a microSD card slot for even more storage options" or in a colon of a table "16GB internal, microSD card slot" the distinction is important as the value extraction can differ for these types
FactValueComparator Sort facts by their trust.
LiveFactExtractor The LiveFactExtractor manages fact extraction for entity names of unknown concepts.
NumericFactDistribution This class keeps track of the distribution of numeric facts.
